shows.title: Chainska Brassika
shows.desc: Here’s a band that will transport you back to the two-tone sounds of the early 80s and its Jamaican origins. With outrageously contagious horns and infectious smiles, this mischievous bunch of South Londoners whip up a ska storm in the style of Toots & The Maytals, Madness and The Specials. Skanking is optional (but hard to resist).
